bike.description: Kinesis 7005 double-butted main frame sloping radius top tube design, SST tubing diameters, 1 1/8-1.5" tapered head tube, 34.9 seat tube, replaceable derailleur hanger

components.description: Full carbon composite straight blade road fork, tapered steerer with 1.5 crown, forged alloy dropouts.
Mavic CXP-22 rims with CNC sidewalls, 28/32H, Formula alloy hubs with QR and 14g stainless steel spokes
Shimano Sora RD-3500 rear and Sora FD-3500 front with 34.9mm alloy clamp
Shimano Sora ST-3500 Dual Control STI, 18-Speed
Touring platform style, full alloy with toe clips
Ritchey Road, 31.6 x 350mm with alloy clamp
Selle San Marco SPID Arrowhead with Syntex cover and carbon steel rails
Tektro R312 alloy dual pivot calipers with adjustable pads and Shimano Sora ST-3500 STI brake levers
